# SkinRestorer

:::tip Available on servers
**Overnight**
:::

**SkinRestorer** is a plugin for managing skins on the server.

---

## ğŸ¨ What is it?

SkinRestorer allows:

- ğŸ‘¤ **Display skins** â€” correct display of all players' skins
- ğŸ”„ **Change skin** â€” set custom skin
- ğŸ–¼ï¸ **Skins by URL** â€” load skin from internet

---

## ğŸ“‹ Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|----------|
| `/skin <nickname>` | Set another player's skin |
| `/skin url <link>` | Set skin by URL |
| `/skin clear` | Reset to default skin |

---

## ğŸ® How to Use

### Another Player's Skin

Want to look like a famous player?

```
/skin Notch
/skin Dream
```

### Skin by Link

Found a cool skin on the internet?

1. Copy direct link to PNG skin file
2. Type `/skin url <link>`

### Restore Your Skin

```
/skin clear
```

## ğŸ’¡ Tips

### Where to Find Skins

- [NameMC](https://namemc.com/) â€” player skins
- [MinecraftSkins](https://www.minecraftskins.com/) â€” skin gallery
- [Planet Minecraft](https://www.planetminecraft.com/skins/) â€” custom skins

### Creating Your Own Skin

Use online editors:
- [Nova Skin](https://minecraft.novaskin.me/)
- [Skindex](https://www.minecraftskins.com/skin-editor/)

---

## â“ FAQ

<details>
<summary>**Skin doesn't change?**</summary>

Try rejoining the server after changing skin. Sometimes it takes time to update.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Can I use HD skins?**</summary>

No, Minecraft only supports standard 64x64 resolution (or 64x32 for old skins).

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Do other players see my new skin?**</summary>

Yes, skin change is visible to all players on the server.

</details>
